Category.Name: Features
Category.Description: Control which optional external libraries to use

BoolProperty.Name: StartupLog
BoolProperty.Description: Enable verbose startup logging to help figuration out where an error occurs

StringProperty.Name: AegisubBuildCredit
StringProperty.Description: Name the build should be credited to. Appears in the about box, and in the title bar of development builds.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseUpdateChecker
BoolProperty.Description: Specify whether to enable the update checker. Should be disabled if you will be distributing builds via something that has its own update checking functionality.

StringProperty.Name: UpdateCheckerServer
StringProperty.Description: Server name to connect to for updates.

StringProperty.Name: MsgFmtPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of msgfmt.exe, for compiling translations

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseAvisynth
BoolProperty.Description: Enable the Avisynth audio and video providers. This is experimental on x64. This has no external build dependencies.

EnumProperty.Name: AegisubUseCsri
EnumProperty.Description: Specify whether to include support for CSRI subtitle rendering. The included helper library dynamically loads CSRI renderers, while linking another library allows you to e.g. link VSFilter.dll directly.

EnumValue.Name: HelperLibrary
EnumValue.Description: Use the included helper library to dynamically load CSRI renderers.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseDSound
BoolProperty.Description: Enable the DirectSound-based audio player. This requires the DirectX SDK.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFfms
BoolProperty.Description: Enable the FFMS2 audio and video providers. Requires copies of the FFMS2 and FFmpeg/libav source

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFftw
BoolProperty.Description: A high-speed fourier transformation library which improves the spectograph speed and quality. Requires a copy of the FFTW 3.2 source.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseFontconfig
BoolProperty.Description: Required for the font collector and libass. Requires Freetype 2 and a copy of the Fontconfig source.

BoolProperty.Name: AegisubUseLibass
BoolProperty.Description: An alternative subtitle renderer which is often faster than VSFilter. Requires Fontconfig, Freetype 2, Fribidi, and a copy of the libass source.

StringProperty.Name: MsysBasePath
StringProperty.Description: Root directory of a copy of msys with git installed. Only required if it is not on your PATH.

StringProperty.Name: WxBasePath
StringProperty.Description: Root directory of the wxWidgets installation to use

StringProperty.Name: WxLibraryPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of compiled wxWidgets library files. Defaults to $(WxBasePath)\lib32 or $(WxBasePath)\lib64.

StringProperty.Name: WxIncludePath
StringProperty.Description: Location of wxWidgets header files. Defaults to $(WxBasePath)\include

StringProperty.Name: CsriLibraryPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of external CSRI library files, for when not using the CSRI helper library.

StringProperty.Name: CsriLibraryName
StringProperty.Description: Name of external CSRI library, for when not using the CSRI helper library

StringProperty.Name: DirectXSDKPath
StringProperty.Description: Location of DirectX SDK installation for DirectSound support. This is usually auto-detected.

StringProperty.Name: FfmpegSrcDir
StringProperty.Description: Location of FFmpeg or libav source code. Required for FFMS2.

StringProperty.Name: Freetype2SrcDir
StringProperty.Description: Location of Freetype 2 source code. Required for libass and fontconfig.

StringProperty.Name: FribidiSrcDir
StringProperty.Description: Location of Fribidi source code. Required for libass.

StringProperty.Name: ZlibSrcDir
StringProperty.Description: Location of zlib source code. Required for FFMS2.
